name: CDP Continuous Delivery Pipeline
title: SAFe Continuous Delivery Pipeline (CDP) Orchestration
description: The Continuous Delivery Pipeline (CDP) represents the processes and practices from Scaled Agile Framework for delivering value continuously. This symphony orchestrates the four key aspects: Continuous Exploration, Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment, and Release on Demand.
purpose: Model the complete SAFe CDP as an orchestrated musical sequence with movements representing aspects and beats representing individual practices

userStory.goal: understand and orchestrate the complete Continuous Delivery Pipeline
userStory.benefit: implement SAFe practices systematically and measure progress across all four key domains

businessValue: Provides a structured, observable model of the SAFe CDP enabling organizations to visualize process flows, identify bottlenecks, and implement practices incrementally across their value stream.
